title: My Neighbor Totoro (BD 720p Triple Audio) [Shouyou]
description:
This is a torrent I made myself of the movie My Neighbor Totoro having all the best options possible. It has the original Japanese audio, the newer Disney dub as well as the Fox Streamline original dub. I also used a higher quality 720p than the PublicHD one, that's why it's about 5 gigs. The video is 10bit and has a bitrate of several mbps. This also has two subtitle options, the dialogue if you want to watch it in Japanese and the signs and songs if you're watching it dubbed but want to read whatever comes up written in Japanese.

I will be seeding this forever but not all the time so once you get the file, if you could seed it, that would be great! If there are any problems with the file, let me know, I did my best to sync up the Fox dub with the video.

If anyone just wants the Fox dub with 720p for a smaller size, I could make that with the PublicHD release.

Info:

Video:

1280x692 10-bit (1.85:1) 23.976 fps H.264 (7.9 Mbps)

Audio 1:

Japanese 2.0 AAC (387 kbps)

Audio 2 (Disney):

English 2.0 AC3 (192 kbps)

Audio 3 (Fox):

English 2.0 AAC (Could not find the bitrate but I'm guessing it's close to the same as the Disney dub.)
